main.title: SSB 比赛听力训练软件
main.subtitle: 灵感来源于 MorseRunner

download_area.title: 马上下载
download_area.subtitle: 点击“下载”按钮跳转到下载页面

feature1.title: Real Interference
feature1.subtitle: The crackling static from thunderstorms, the buzzing adjacent frequency interference, and the fluctuating signal fading—classic QRN, QRM, and QSB can all be found here across all shortwave bands.

feature2.title: Global Accents
feature2.subtitle: You will hear operators with American, British, Russian, Japanese, and other regional accents - just like in a real international competition. Their speaking speeds vary greatly, ranging from clear and slow to lightning-fast champion speeds.

feature3.title: Pileup Simulation
feature3.subtitle: You can freely set the number of radios responding simultaneously to a single signal response, creating a chaotic scene of up to 15 radios being bombarded at the same time. This trains your ability to accurately capture call signs in chaos.

footer.line1: SSB Runner 是一个非盈利，非商业，开源的软件项目。
footer.line2: 只因它让更多人享受比赛的乐趣。
